Based on game credits it's hard to tell if he just made sound effects for a game or also made music for them. He is responsible for the sound effects in many of the Konami games.

List of games he might have worked on the music or just the sound effects (no way to tell)

Firebird

The Treasure of Uşas

Shalom

Pennant Race 1

Parodius

King's Valley 2

Gofer's Ambition Episode II (Nemesis 3)

Quarth

He's also the one who came up with the idea to put in a soundchip in a cartridge (which would become the SCC).

Common misconceptions: Some people think she worked on Vampire Killer. The reason is that she worked on Castlevania for the Genesis for which the subtitle is Vampire Killer in Japan. In Europe this game is better known as Castlevania Bloodlines.

Another misconception is that she made the music for TwinBee (stated on wikipedia as being her debut), since she only joined Konami in 1988. Probably that's a mix up with TwinBee Da!! (Japanese title) or Pop'n TwinBee for the GB.

Gradius might also be a mix up with Gofer's Ambition Episode II (Nemesis 3) for which she made some music.
